sml:Term.sml:label: Lamp serial number hgasd jfhg askjfdhg khasgdf kjhasg

swe:Count.swe:label: Shot Counter
swe:Count.swe:description: Number of measurements performed with the lamp

swe:Quantity.swe:label: CAL 254 nm
swe:Quantity.swe:description: calibration factor 254 nm

swe:Quantity.swe:label: CAL 530 nm
swe:Quantity.swe:description: calibration factor 530 nm

swe:Quantity.swe:label: ClkIdleTime 254 nm
swe:Quantity.swe:description: Idle time of the control signal for the 254 nm LED

swe:Quantity.swe:label: ClkDutyTime 254 nm
swe:Quantity.swe:description: Duty time of the control signal for the 254 nm LED

swe:Quantity.swe:label: ClkIdleTime 530 nm
swe:Quantity.swe:description: Idle time of the control signal for the 530 nm LED

swe:Quantity.swe:label: ClkDutyTime 530 nm
swe:Quantity.swe:description: Duty time of the control signal for the 530 nm LED

swe:Quantity.swe:label: Temperature Coefficient 254 nm
swe:Quantity.swe:description: The temperature coefficient of the 254 nm LED

swe:Quantity.swe:label: Temperature Coefficient 530 nm
swe:Quantity.swe:description: The temperature coefficient of the 530 nm LED

swe:Quantity.swe:label: SAK 254nm
swe:Quantity.swe:description: spectral absorption coefficient at 254nm

swe:Quantity.swe:label: CODeq
swe:Quantity.swe:description: ToDo

swe:Quantity.swe:label: BODeq
swe:Quantity.swe:description: ToDo

swe:Quantity.swe:label: TOCeq
swe:Quantity.swe:description: ToDo

swe:Quantity.swe:label: Transmission
swe:Quantity.swe:description: ToDo

swe:Quantity.swe:label: Transmission 254 nm
swe:Quantity.swe:description: transmission at 254 nm

swe:Quantity.swe:label: Transmission 530 nm
swe:Quantity.swe:description: transmission at 530 nm

swe:Quantity.swe:label: Calibrated Raw 254 nm
swe:Quantity.swe:description: intensity at 254 nm (calibrated raw value)

swe:Quantity.swe:label: Calibrated Raw 530 nm
swe:Quantity.swe:description: intensity at 530 nm (calibrated raw value)

swe:Quantity.swe:label: Raw 254 nm
swe:Quantity.swe:description: intensity at 254 nm (raw value)

swe:Quantity.swe:label: Raw 530 nm
swe:Quantity.swe:description: intensity at 530 nm (raw value)

swe:Quantity.swe:label: Raw Dark 254 nm
swe:Quantity.swe:description: noise at 254 nm (raw value)

swe:Quantity.swe:label: Raw Dark 530 nm
swe:Quantity.swe:description: noise at 530 nm (raw value)

swe:Boolean.swe:label: Automatic mode on
swe:Boolean.swe:description: Indicates if the automatic mode is active.

swe:Quantity.swe:label: Measurement Interval (s)
swe:Quantity.swe:description: The length of the measurement interval

swe:Count.swe:label: Number of measurements used for averaging
swe:Count.swe:description: The number of single measurements for calculating the average of a measurement

swe:Quantity.swe:label: Offset CODeq (s)
swe:Quantity.swe:description: The offset for calculating the CSB equivalent from the SAK 254 nm (formula: CODeq = Scaling x (SAC - Offset)

swe:Quantity.swe:label: Scaling CODeq (s)
swe:Quantity.swe:description: The scale factor for calculating the CSB equivalent from the SAK 254 nm (formula: CODeq = Scaling x (SAC - Offset)

swe:Quantity.swe:label: Offset BODeq (s)
swe:Quantity.swe:description: The offset for calculating the BSB equivalent from the SAK 254 nm (formula: BODeq = Scaling x (SAC - Offset)

swe:Quantity.swe:label: Scaling CODeq (s)
swe:Quantity.swe:description: The scale factor for calculating the BSB equivalent from the SAK 254 nm (formula: CODeq = Scaling x (SAC - Offset)

swe:Quantity.swe:label: Offset TOCeq (s)
swe:Quantity.swe:description: The offset for calculating the TOC equivalent from the SAK 254 nm (formula: Toceq = Scaling x (SAC - Offset)

swe:Quantity.swe:label: Scaling TOCeq (s)
swe:Quantity.swe:description: The scale factor for calculating the TOC equivalent from the SAK 254 nm (formula: Toceq = Scaling x (SAC - Offset)

swe:Quantity.swe:label: WB 254 nm
swe:Quantity.swe:description: Reference intensity I0 (water basis) at 254 nm

swe:Quantity.swe:label: WB 530 nm
swe:Quantity.swe:description: Reference intensity I0 (water basis) at 530 nm

swe:Quantity.swe:label: WB Temperature (°C)
swe:Quantity.swe:description: Temperature at the time of the reference measurement (water basis)

swe:Quantity.swe:label: CAL Detector
swe:Quantity.swe:description: Calibration factor of the detector

swe:Quantity.swe:label: Path Length (mm)
swe:Quantity.swe:description: Optical path length through the medium
